branding.tagline: The hub of Sudoku, where numbers connect!

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Sudoku puzzles including traditional, wordoku, killer sudoku and samurai sudoku
publishing_focus.target_audience: Sudoku fans of all ages and skill levels
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Offers an extensive range of Sudoku variants, with an emphasis on clarity, quality and choice
publishing_focus.example_titles: Killer Sudoku Challenges by Carol Vorderman, Samurai Sudoku by Thomas Snyder
